message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.SI, cs.CY, cs.CR

Reasoning: 
- cs.CL (Computation and Language): The paper deals with natural language processing techniques applied to drug-related textual posts on online forums. 
- cs.IR (Information Retrieval): The paper proposes a semi-supervised approach to knowledge extraction for detecting drugs and their effects from large corpora of textual posts. 
- cs.SI (Social and Information Networks): The paper focuses on the analysis of drug-related discussions on online forums, which can be seen as a social network of drug users and dealers. 
- cs.CY (Computers and Society): The paper addresses the societal issue of the trade and use of new psychoactive substances, which are not officially banned and can be easily sold and bought online. 
- cs.CR (Cryptography and Security): The paper touches upon the security aspect of the trade of new psychoactive substances, which can be difficult to prosecute due to their grey area of legislation.
